# Get started

Steps to develop apps:

 1. Create R package with your stuff
 2. Expose via OpenCPU single user server
 3. Deploy via public server or docker or elsewhere


## Hello world

 1. Start a single-user server
 2. Run some apps
 3. Poke around with `curl` or the test page.
 4. Get some objects in formats, do rpc, post data. Reuse objects from session.
